name: Game Grumps: Joint Justice (Demo)
description:
Episode 1: Turnabout Power Hour

Meet your favorite YouTube duo in an intense Ace Attorney-like game! Someone stole the 10 Minute Power Hour dinos, and only Arin & Dan can figure out the culprit of this heinous crime and save their friend Jory!

Controls
  • X to advance text, hold X to speedscroll the current text
  • Z to show Court Record
  • C to press on cross examinations
  • Enter while in the Court Record to present evidence
  • Down while in the Court Record to cycle through evidence/profile menus
  • Escape to pause the game
Check our website for updates on the full game. Tell us what you thought on our Discord!
